alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Crowley County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 13 at 4:12AM MST until December 14 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. There could be some freezing rain, or freezing drizzle, by late tonight through early tomorrow morning for portions of the northern I-25 corridor. * WHERE...El Paso, Pueblo, eastern Fremont, Crowley, and Otero Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM Wednesday to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning and evening commutes. Very slick conditions possible if freezing rain or freezing drizzle occurs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
